page.shortlink: api objects session object save file to session file method
page.description: Saves source file content to the session-state collection under IIS.
page.prototype: Context.Session.SaveFileToSessionFile as L (SourceFile as C, Key as C [, RemoveAfterFirstRetrieval as L])

argument.name: SourceName
argument.description: The full path of the file whose contents are to be saved into the session-state collection.

argument.name: Key
argument.description: The key for the data in the session-state collection. The value of key is a file name without any path components.

argument.name: RemoveAfterFirstRetrieval
argument.description: Default value is .t.. Reserved for future use.

argument.name: RemoveAfterFirstRetrieval
argument.description: This is reserved for future use.

page.discussion: Context.Session.SaveFileToSessionFile() saves the contents of the source file to the session-state collection under IIS. Under the stand-alone application server, the source file is copied to disk in the stand-alone application server's session folder. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
